Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 120th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Hipolito Cañizares (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/4/2015, off Jeffery Wert (CIN)...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2015...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/4/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/5/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $5,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/20/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
